name: Bleeps and Blobs
description:
You got teleported into an alien world that was full of blob creatures that certainly not welcoming you! Defeat the blobs, find allies along the way, and escape the weirdness of this place!

                                                                                   

Ayy, it's TanzDev here!

"Bleeps and Blobs" is an infinite scrolling bullet hell inspired from other notable titles such as Neptunia Shooter and Touhou Project games.
I've actually made some bullet hell games before in the past, but for this one I managed to publish it!

This is also my biggest "collaboration" project! There are a bunch of IDVTubers that I feature on this game as a playable characters~!

Thank you for checking out the game and I hope you're having fun!
